shape_0_per_frame1=i=3*instance;     
shape_0_per_frame2=
shape_0_per_frame3=x1=gmegabuf(i);     y1=gmegabuf(i+1);
shape_0_per_frame4=rad=gmegabuf(i+2);
shape_0_per_frame5=
shape_0_per_frame6=zoom=q2;
shape_0_per_frame7=x= .5+zoom*x1/q6;
shape_0_per_frame8=y= .5+zoom*y1;      
shape_0_per_frame9=
shape_0_per_frame10=sample=.5*i/1024;
shape_0_per_frame11=r= .3+.1*sin(3*sample+.7*q2*d+.2*time);
shape_0_per_frame12=g= .3+.1*sin(3*sample+.8*q2*d+.23*time);
shape_0_per_frame13=b= .1+.1*sin(3*sample+.4*q2*d+.15*time);
shapecode_1_enabled=1

shape_1_per_frame13=b= .1+.1*sin(3*sample+.4*q2*d+.15*time);

shape_2_per_frame1=i=3*(instance+2048);     
shape_2_per_frame2=
shape_2_per_frame3=x1=gmegabuf(i);     y1=gmegabuf(i+1);
shape_2_per_frame4=rad=gmegabuf(i+2);
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=zoom=q2;
shape_2_per_frame7=x= .5+zoom*x1/q6;
shape_2_per_frame8=y= .5+zoom*y1;      
shape_2_per_frame9=
shape_2_per_frame10=sample=.5*i/1024;
shape_2_per_frame11=r= .3+.1*sin(3*sample+.7*q2*d+.2*time);
shape_2_per_frame12=g= .3+.1*sin(3*sample+.8*q2*d+.23*time);
shape_2_per_frame13=b= .1+.1*sin(3*sample+.4*q2*d+.15*time);
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=10
shapecode_3_additive=1
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1024
shapecode_3_x=0.380
shapecode_3_y=0.280
shapecode_3_rad=0.03682
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.54929
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.700
shapecode_3_b=0.200
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=0.700
shapecode_3_border_b=0.100
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=i=3*(instance+3072);     
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=x1=gmegabuf(i);     y1=gmegabuf(i+1);
shape_3_per_frame4=rad=gmegabuf(i+2);
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=zoom=q2;
shape_3_per_frame7=x= .5+zoom*x1/q6;
shape_3_per_frame8=y= .5+zoom*y1;      
shape_3_per_frame9=
shape_3_per_frame10=sample=.5*i/1024;
shape_3_per_frame11=r= .3+.1*sin(3*sample+.7*q2*d+.2*time);
shape_3_per_frame12=g= .3+.1*sin(3*sample+.8*q2*d+.23*time);
shape_3_per_frame13=b= .1+.1*sin(3*sample+.4*q2*d+.15*time);
per_frame_init_1=i=0;  
per_frame_init_2=loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_3=
per_frame_init_4=i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_5=
per_frame_init_6=t=7;
per_frame_init_7=
per_frame_init_8=t0=time;
per_frame_1=q6=aspecty;       t=t+.1/fps;   t1=t1+1/fps;  
per_frame_2=c=bnot(frame%2);                s=10*sin(.2*t);
per_frame_3=i=0;    x=0;     y=0;   p=0;    p1=pow(10,12);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=loop(4*1024*c,  
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=p=p+ sin(t)*(sin(i*s+t)+ cos(i*s-t));   p1=p1+p;
per_frame_8=x=x+sin(p1);                            y=y+cos(p1);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=d=sqrt(x*x+y*y);
per_frame_11=rad=.0001+.00005*d;
per_frame_12=rad=if(above(rad,.005),.005,rad);
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=gmegabuf(3*i)=x;     gmegabuf(3*i+1)=y;   gmegabuf(3*i+2)=rad ;
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=i=i+1;);
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=///// clears the screen each n seconds
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=n=7;
per_frame_21=decay=above(time-t0,.2)-equal((5*t1)%(5*n),0);
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=monitor=s;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=q2=.004;   //// zoom
per_frame_26=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 pixelsize = texsize.zw;
warp_4=`float2 uvm = uv_orig;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`float4 noiseVal = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, frac(noise_uv*8));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`ret.xyz = saturate(tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uvm).xyz*float3(1,1,.97) - float3(.0,.0,.001));
warp_10=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.wzy;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`
warp_13=`float3 rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.xy-.5)*6*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_14=`if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_15=`ret.xy = rsamp.xy;ret.z = rsamp.z;}
warp_16=`
warp_17=`//rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.zw-.5)*2*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_18=`//if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_19=`//ret.xy = rsamp.xy;ret.z = rsamp.z;}
warp_20=`
warp_21=`
warp_22=`ret.xy *= pow(ret.z,.01);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`
warp_25=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_26=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_27=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_28=`                      ).xyz*
warp_29=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_30=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_31=`                     );
warp_32=`if(ret.x> q21*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q24*roam_sin.x)ret.y -= (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_33=`if(ret.y> q22*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q25*roam_cos.x)ret.z -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_34=`if(ret.z> q23*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q26*roam_sin.y)ret.x -= (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_35=`
warp_36=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 ac = float2(q11,q12);
comp_5=`float2 mu = float2(q13,q14);
comp_6=`float2 c = float2(q15,q16);
comp_7=`float2 d = float2(q17,q18);
comp_8=`
comp_9=`float2 z = (uv-0.5)*aspect.xy;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`// (c*z + d)
comp_12=`float2 czd = float2(z.x*c.x-z.y*c.y,z.x*c.y-z.y*c.x) + d;
comp_13=`// mu/(cz+d)
comp_14=`float2 moebius = float2( mu.x*czd.x + mu.y*czd.y , mu.y*czd.x-mu.x*czd.y )/(czd.x*czd.x+czd.y*czd.y) + ac;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`moebius*=0.5;
comp_17=`float l = length(moebius);
comp_18=`moebius = 0.5 + (1.0 - abs( frac( moebius * 0.5 ) * 2 - 1.0 )-0.5)*0.95;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`float2 uvr = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*0.2;
comp_21=`
comp_22=`ret = GetPixel(uvr).z*float3(0.4,0,0.7);
comp_23=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0,1,1),saturate(tex2d(sampler_fc_main,moebius).y))*(1.4-pow(l*0.8,0.3));
comp_24=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(4,1,0),saturate(tex2d(sampler_fc_main,uvr).y-tex2d(sampler_pc_main,uvr).y)*4*(l*l));
comp_25=`ret = lerp(ret,-4,GetPixel(uvr).x);
comp_26=`ret = lerp(ret,2,tex2d(sampler_pc_main,uvr).x*0.75);
comp_27=`ret-=roam_sin.zyx*roam_cos.ywx;
comp_28=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_29=`}
